about_the_game:
As a supply scout for a struggling survivor colony, your mission is simple: collect supplies, fight off the undead, and bring what you can back to base. But the world is far from simple. The undead aren’t the only danger lurking—other players will stop at nothing to take what you’ve scavenged. In this harsh new world, everyone is a threat.

Key Features:

  • Top-Down Combat & Survival: Engage in tactical, top-down gameplay where every mission is a fight for survival. Scavenge, shoot, and strategize to make it back to your colony with precious supplies.

  • Tense PvP and PvE Action: Battle both the relentless undead and hostile players in a constantly shifting, dangerous environment. Your supplies are your lifeline—protect them at all costs.

  • RPG Progression: Level up your character, improve your skills, and find new gear to help you survive the ever-growing threats in the world.

  • Persistent Online World: Dive into a living, breathing world where your actions have lasting consequences. Your colony's survival depends on your ability to navigate the dangers of the apocalypse.

  • Survival at Any Cost: Will you cooperate with other survivors, or will you betray them for your own gain? Every encounter is an opportunity to choose your path—trust is a rare commodity in this new world.

The apocalypse isn’t just a backdrop—it’s your reality. Survive, scavenge, and fight to stay alive in a world where every supply run is a high-stakes gamble. The question isn’t whether you’ll survive—it’s for how long..

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains intense themes and content that may not be suitable for all players. It includes survival elements set in a Zombie apocalypse with scenes of violence, horror, and gore. There are also references to drugs and alcohol. Player discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: In a world overrun by zombies, every supply run is a battle. Scavenge weapons, face undead horrors, and protect your loot from hostile players. Survival isn’t just about fighting—it’s about choosing who to trust.
